lead_paragraph: At the Long Island Spring Regional, the winners of the two-session Stratified Pairs on Saturday were Jeff Aker of Briarcliff, N.Y., and Barry Rigal of Manhattan.
snippet: At the Long Island Spring Regional, the winners of the two-session Stratified Pairs on Saturday were Jeff Aker of Briarcliff, N.Y., and Barry Rigal of Manhattan.

headline.main: To Avoid an Unwanted Shift, Leave Easy Outs
headline.print_headline: To Avoid an Unwanted Shift, Leave Easy Outs
